message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $950000. It's a significant asset that I believe would be highly valuable to your operations. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe that's a more reasonable price for this product.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $850000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $900000. This reflects the significant value this product will bring to your operations and allows for a fair return on my investment. I'm confident this is a price that benefits both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $900000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $875000. This price reflects the value I believe the product will bring to my operations, but also takes into account my budget constraints.
